Dear Families,
Due to COVID 19, RVUSD is able to participate in the federally subsidized Seamless Summer Program, which allows us to provide meals to children in our community at no charge.
All children 18 and under may receive breakfast and lunch daily, and families may request meals for multiple days, including weekends. Children do not need to be present to receive meals.
During this time, RVUSD has served over 19,560 student meals. We are prepared to serve all children in our community and look forward to welcoming you at Village or Whited.

Seven girls have seven bags each
49 bags
Each bag has seven big cats
343 big cats
For each big cat there are seven small cats
2401 small cats
How many legs?
Assuming each girl has two legs, each cat has four
7(2) + 343(4) + 2401(4)
10990
So there are 10990 legs on the bus

-Wash hands frequently.
We will continue to communicate with you as we receive new information and guidance.
